page.syntax: Result_Flag as L = Peek(Data BYREF as C, LengthRequested as N)

argument.name: Result_Flag
argument.description: TRUE (.T.) if the operation was successful; otherwise FALSE (.F.).

argument.name: Data
argument.description: The data read by the method.

argument.name: LengthRequested
argument.description: The number of characters to read.

page.description: Read received characters from into stringNote: Peek does not remove the charaters from the receive buffer.
page.discussion: The INET::Socket::Peek() method reads received characters from into a string. Peek()does not remove the characters from the receive buffer.
